channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- libyang
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- libyang

item.title: CVE-2019-19334|2024-08-05T02:16:46.899Z -- red%20hat -- libyang
item.description: In all versions of libyang before 1.0-r5, a stack-based buffer overflow was discovered in the way libyang parses YANG files with a leaf of type "identityref". An application that uses libyang to parse untrusted YANG files may be vulnerable to this flaw, which would allow an attacker to cause a denial of service or possibly gain code execution.

item.title: CVE-2019-19333|2024-08-05T02:16:46.793Z -- red%20hat -- libyang
item.description: In all versions of libyang before 1.0-r5, a stack-based buffer overflow was discovered in the way libyang parses YANG files with a leaf of type "bits". An application that uses libyang to parse untrusted YANG files may be vulnerable to this flaw, which would allow an attacker to cause a denial of service or possibly gain code execution.
